name: Feed The Monster Plant
description: Use W, A, S, D to move the player around. The objective of the game is to feed the monster plant the blue mushrooms in the field so that it can grow to a Monster Plant. The monster plant needs to be watered with your water can before the time runs out. Press space to refill the water can in the well, and F to water the monster plant. This is my first Game Jam submission. A game done in a week I'm still amazed.
